AcceptTccVpcEndPointConnect.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tccatalog.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AcceptVpcEndPointConnect
<公共请求参数>

    "EndPointId": [
        "vpce-sjdh8hd2"
    ],
    "AcceptFlag": true
}
AcceptTccVpcEndPointConnect.title: 接受终端节点连接
